Mr. MIN. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to congratulate Colonel Dominic V.  Dinh on his retirement from the United States Army Reserve.

Colonel Dinh immigrated to the United States as a Vietnamese refugee  in April 1975 and joined the Army Reserve in 1990…
